import React from "react"; import { makeStyles } from "@material-ui/core/styles"; import Grid from "@material-ui/core/Grid"; import TextField from "@material-ui/core/TextField"; import Button from "@material-ui/core/Button"; import PublishRoundedIcon from "@material-ui/icons/PublishRounded"; import WallpaperIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Wallpaper"; import Logo from "../images/ostello-png-1-2@2x.png"; import Vector1 from "../images/vector-64@1x.svg"; import Vector2 from "../images/vector-65@1x.svg"; import { Typography } from "@material-ui/core"; import "../Components/fonts.css"; import CreateBlogStyles from "../Components/blogStyles" import axios from "axios"; export default function CenteredGrid() { const classes = CreateBlogStyles(); return (
W R I T E A BLOG
Ostello
Blog Title
Tell us your story
Upload Cover Image
Upload Content Image
 {/* Grid for Publish Button */}
); }
